title: Create a Project Cash Flow Projection
description: A PM needs to create a cash flow projection to show the expected timing of expenses and client payments throughout the project.

tasks.description: Retrieve the cost-loaded project schedule, which shows the expected spending over time.
Retrieve the client payment schedule from the prime contract.
tasks.expected_outcome: The schedule of client payments is retrieved.

tasks.description: Generate a cash flow curve by plotting the cumulative expenses against the cumulative income over the project timeline.
tasks.expected_outcome: A cash flow projection graph is created, highlighting periods of negative cash flow.
